headline: Road Warriors: Consumers Energy Expands Fleet of High-Tech Vehicles to Find Gas Leaks, Protect Customers
summary: Consumers Energy is hitting the road to protect the safety of its natural gas customers this year, deploying eight state-of-the-art vehicles that will survey the company's nearly 30,000-mile system to find methane leaks.
